title: ETV: Decent For Income, But Not As Good At Protecting Against Inflation As Other Options
description: Eaton Vance Tax-Managed Buy-Write Opportunities Fund offers a high yield of 9.08%, selling index call options on S&P 500 and NASDAQ-100. Read more on ETV CEF here.

title: Inside The World’s Fastest-Growing Slot Machine Company
description: Las Vegas-based Light & Wonder has been on a massive winning streak, with $2.9 billion in revenue last year. Here’s how it steals market share from the biggest players in the industry.
keywords: Light & Wonder, Light & Wonder slots, Light & Wonder slot machines, Slot machines, Slot machines Aristocrat, Matt Wilson Light & Wonder
